response.overview: ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ If you’ve requested a refund for your TotalAV subscription and want to know how long it will take for the money to return to your account, the timeline depends on the payment method used, your bank’s processing policies, and the refund approval process — and if you need real-time updates or billing clarification, you can call ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ for live support. ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ Once your TotalAV refund request is approved under the official money-back guarantee, the company typically begins processing the refund within 24 to 48 hours after confirmation, and you’ll receive an email notification once the refund has been initiated. ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽ However, although TotalAV may process the refund quickly on their end, the time it takes for the funds to show up in your bank account, credit card statement, PayPal balance, or other payment method can vary based on how your financial institution processes incoming refunds. ➽ US-1-855-535-4580 ➽
